name: 膳食研究與營養流行病學
description: 介紹膳食營養評估方法學原理及應用營養流行病學研究設計以了解族群飲食型態及與各種疾病或健康之關係。
goals: 介紹膳食相關質性及量性研究方法學原理以了解個人及族群飲食型態
了解營養流行病學相關研究設計
評估及設計相關膳食營養研究
應用相關研究方法於營養教育及健康促進
syllabus:
1.Understand dietary patterns for individual and populations and controversial issues in evaluating diet quality

2\. Dietary methodology by qualitative and quantitative methods

3\. The past, present, and future of nutritional epidemiology

4\. Basic concepts of medical epidemiology and statistics

5\. Design, planning, and evaluation of nutritional epidemiological studies

6\. Dietary methodology: recall/record

7\. Dietary methodology: FFQ

8\. Food consumption and food composition development

9\. Administration methods, validity and reproducibility

10\. Ecological studies

11\. Cross-sectional studies

12\. Case-control studies

13\. Cohort studies

14\. Experimental studies

15\. Exposure and end points in epidemiology

16\. Biochemical and anthropometric measurements

17\. How to organize, analyze and interpret data

18\. How to design the related questionnaires

methodologies.note: 參訪相關研究單位 (台大公衛學院、中研院、國衛院或調查公司)
